--- gql_skeleton.sql
GRAPH MyGraph
RETURN 1 AS a
NEXT
RETURN a + 1 AS a
UNION ALL
RETURN 10 AS a

--- AST
&ast.GQLGraphQuery{
  GraphClause: &ast.GQLGraphClause{
    PropertyGraphName: &ast.Path{
      Idents: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 6,
          NameEnd: 13,
          Name:    "MyGraph",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  MultiLinearQueryStatement: &ast.GQLMultiLinearQueryStatement{
    Statements: []ast.GQLLinearQueryStatement{
      &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
        PrimitiveQueryStatementList: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
          &ast.GQLReturnStatement{
            Return:      14,
            ReturnItems: []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
              &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 21,
                  ValueEnd: 22,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "1",
                },
                Alias: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 26,
                  NameEnd: 27,
                  Name:    "a",
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.GQLCompoundLinearQueryStatement{
        Op:            "UNION",
        AllOrDistinct: "ALL",
        Statements:    []ast.GQLLinearQueryStatement{
          &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
            PrimitiveQueryStatementList: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
              &ast.GQLReturnStatement{
                Return:      33,
                ReturnItems: []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
                  &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                    Expr: &ast.BinaryExpr{
                      Op:   "+",
                      Left: &ast.Ident{
                        NamePos: 40,
                        NameEnd: 41,
                        Name:    "a",
                      },
                      Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
                        ValuePos: 44,
                        ValueEnd: 45,
                        Base:     10,
                        Value:    "1",
                      },
                    },
                    Alias: &ast.Ident{
                      NamePos: 49,
                      NameEnd: 50,
                      Name:    "a",
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
            },
          },
          &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
            PrimitiveQueryStatementList: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
              &ast.GQLReturnStatement{
                Return:      61,
                ReturnItems: []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
                  &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                    Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                      ValuePos: 68,
                      ValueEnd: 70,
                      Base:     10,
                      Value:    "10",
                    },
                    Alias: &ast.Ident{
                      NamePos: 74,
                      NameEnd: 75,
                      Name:    "a",
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRAPH MyGraph RETURN 1 AS a NEXT RETURN a + 1 AS a UNION ALL RETURN 10 AS a
